txt.en: You have defeated a number of Orcs around The Cross-roads of Ash as they protected their altars.
While placing the statues upon the altars, defeat as many Ghâsh-hai as possible.
You have defeated a number of Orcs around The Cross-roads of Ash as they protected their altars.
The Ghâsh-hai will protect the altars at all costs. Defeat as many of the Ghâsh-hai as possible while placing the stones upon the altars.
Defeat Ghâsh-hai Orcs protecting the altars that surround The Cross-roads of Ash
Ghâsh-hai Orcs can be found protecting the altars located around The Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nYou should defeat many Orcs in the areas surrounding The Cross-roads of Ash.
Defeat Ghâsh-hai Orcs protecting the altars that surround The Cross-roads of Ash ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ghâsh-hai Orcs can be found protecting the altars located around The Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nYou should defeat many Orcs in the areas surrounding The Cross-roads of Ash.
